channel.title: Eternal Resurrection 374 Server Development Team (Recruiting)
channel.description:
Ok im here today to start a next best generation of runescape gaming im looking for everything below...[shadow=red,left][/shadow]
Website Coder Idea Men Source Coder Client Coder Graphics coder Quest Coders Event Coders Clue Scroll Coders Shop Coders Monster Coders Drop Coders Price Coders NPC Coder NPC Talking Looking for a 602 cache
Choose a spot and fill the information below
What Part Of Development
Age
Country
Time
How Much Time Will You Be Able To Spend On Coding
ok i have found a source (RuneSource562)
I am still working on a website so just apply here

item.title: Eternal Resurrection 374 Server Development Team (Recruiting)
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:

Ok im here today to start a next best generation of runescape gaming im looking for everything below…[shadow=red,left][/shadow]

Source Coder
Client Coder

Quest Coders
Event Coders
Clue Scroll Coders

Monster Coders
Drop Coders
Price Coders
NPC Coder
NPC Talking

Age

Country

Time

How Much Time Will You Be Able To Spend On Coding

ok i have found a source (RuneSource562)

I am still working on a website so just apply here
[/quote]

I could host the server. Most people that host servers don’t realize that you will lag from time to time, and you won’t be up 24/7. I have 8k bandwidth a month, and 8GB ram. If you are %100 serious about making this server, and you wan’t a dedicated hoster, let me know.[/quote]
The “%” goes after the number.

@OP: Is it an actual 374? Or is it a typo, or you’re loading 374 cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Eternal Resurrection 374 Server Development Team (Recruiting)
item.dc:creator: @Schitzomniac Schitzomniac
item.description:
@Schitzomniac wrote:

What Part Of Development: I would most likely take part in the Web development, a site i have created is here: www.mafia-cinema.at.ua

Age: I am currently 19 years of age

Country: I reside in Canada

Time: GMT (mountain time)

How Much Time Will You Be Able To Spend On Coding: if needed up to 8 hrs/day

Thanks for reading my application
Steven

Read full topic
